name: Aobing Zhuan
nutshell:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.
[Updates on the 8th and 21st of each month]

name: Renai Moratorium
nutshell: Rei, an AV actor, is suffering from ennui. But things are about to change when he runs into one of his classmates from middle school.

name: She Is Coming, Please Get Down!
tags: Thriller,Action,Psychological,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Reverse Harem,Magical Girls,Mafia,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
The 18-year-old actress fell into the sea, when she returned her personality completely changed. Before she was soft, easy to bully, suddenly now she is a ruthless killer that everyone hears scared . From poor acting to talented actress, rich men everywhere are wholeheartedly respectful to her …
Tacit rules? How much money is your company worth?
Famous actress? I just had a little fun, not being careful won the prize.
Trash? I understand the most is this, do not be too weak, then I am not satisfied.
Returning in the name of the god of death, I will take revenge

name: Kume Short
nutshell: Kume Short centers on a short-haired girl named Nikaidou Tomoko who lives in a high-rise condo…

name: The Daily Lives of 22 and 33
nutshell: The cute (but stupid) sister 22, and her surprisingly intelligent and capable younger sister 33. A comedy about the daily lives of the two sisters!

name: Trill on Eden
nutshell: Admitting herself as super unlucky person, Ritsu, freshman in high school, tries to get out of unluckiness and disasters by living in the school dorms and starting fresh. However, with her destined meeting with school's famous genius as well as problematic student Eiri, Ritsu starts to get unluckier everyday….!?

name: Vocabulary Does Not Always Exist in a Different World
My Eternal Master
nutshell: As a child, Makoto is sold off to a rich pedophile to pay his parents' debt. Even though his life is like this, there is one spot of light - his friendship with Shuuichi, the master's son. But why lately does it seem that Shuuichi is growing more and more distant from Makoto?

name: Kimi wa Candy
nutshell:
From Rebellious Love:
Mizukoshi gets to sit beside Hidaka this time, he's cute and popular, how lucky! Mizukoshi can't help falling in love with him, but he has a girlfriend! What's Mizukoshi going to do? Includes a few other cute short stories.

name: SSSS.GRIDMAN Comic Anthology
nutshell:
Collection of short stories based on the original anime SSSS.GRIDMAN.

name: The honest person who wants to be saved
Honey Maple More More Sugar
nutshell:
I’m already getting hard….”
“Hey, is it okay if I come?”
University student Mukai Tsumugi is openly gay after coming out. It’s my rule to do what I want when it comes to romance and sex, but lately I’ve been addicted to lewd chats with “Chiitan ☆” whom I met online. Just what kind of person is “Chiitan ☆,” the erotic seme whose likes and hobbies match. Just chatting isn’t enough! I finally managed to invite the reluctant Chiitan ☆ out and when we met face to face, he turned out to be a tough looking police officer….!? Moreover, despite his outward appearance, Chiitan ☆ turns out to be a natural gentleman full of first times! It began with an erotic chat, a tough looking police office x genderless boy’s sweet and erotic fancy love.

name: Ezumi
nutshell: Published in Bête Noire #1, June 2005

name: Girls' Frontline 4koma (AC130)
nutshell: Developed by Mica Team, Girls' Frontline is a mobile Tactical SLG for Android and iOS where the player takes the role of a newly recruited commander in a Private Military Company named Grifon&Kryuger and completes various tasks by commanding highly advanced androids known as Tactical Dolls.

name: Honto no Suki no Mitsuke Kata - Sensei to Watashi no Kobosen
nutshell:
"I want to have a wonderful dream-like love - one like in a shoujo manga..."
Misan Shino, a talented, cool, and beautiful college student, is looking for a way to find "true love".  Misan is interested in Momose-sensei, who is flirty and a little awkward. However, for some reason, Momose-sensei seems to intentionally avoid Misan...? Misan, who doesn't know what it's like to fall in love, tries to get closer to him, as she is puzzled by her feelings for sensei, which are growing day by day..!?
The sweet and heart-pounding battle between sensei and a female college student is about to begin!

name: The Vampire's Bride
nutshell: Vampdolls are girls who live by feeding on the blood of other girls... and it's their mission to seek out and destroy all werewolves!

name: Touhou - Hotel Chireiden (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Koishi x Satori doujin.

name: They Were Eleven!
nutshell:
The elite Cosmo Academy attracts applicants from every stellar nation in the galaxy. One young hopeful is Tadatos Lane, an orphan esper from Terra. The final stage of the academy's entrance exam is a perilous mission simulation aboard an actual derelict starship. The applicants depart for the ships in groups of ten, but when Tada's crew arrives on the Esperanza, they are horrified to discover that they now number eleven. As the test progresses, things go awry and the atmosphere grows increasingly tense. The crew members begin to suspect sabotage, and Tada appears to be the likely culprit.
The original printing of this manga were volumes 13 and 14 of the Hagio Moto Works Collection.

name: Kanchigai, Tokidoki Koi
nutshell:
Taira Naoshi always had a better than average sense of smell, so he could never handle crowded places. One day, while on a crowded train and nearly passed out due to his sensitive nose, a student from another school helps him. Now, to find his crush, he changes high schools.
Warning about Chapter 5:
||Contains incest.||

name: Friends
nutshell: "Friends," by Sugio Hisako, tells of a promiscuous woman who realizes she's fallen in love with her friend.

name: Shitsuji
nutshell:
In the Shitsuji series:
V.1 - Shitsuji wa Daitanfuteki ni Uso o Tsuku (The Butler Boldly Lies)
V.2 - Shitsuji wa Shirokujichuu mo Ai o Sasayaku
V.3 - Shitsuji wa Mondou Muyou de Kuchibiru o Ubau
V.4 - Shitsuji wa Denkousekka de Amaku Dakishimeru
V.5 - Shitsuji wa Yuiitsu Muni no Koi ni Oboreru
V.6 - Shitsuji wa Isshin Furan ni Hada o Motomeru

name: Bitter - Nakechau Koi Monogatari
nutshell:
A collection of love stories.


Chouchougumo (蝶々雲, Butterfly Cloud) by ASHIHARA Hinako


Circuit no Joou-sama (サーキットの女王様, Racing Queen) by IZUMI Kaneyoshi


English Garden by SAKURAKOJI Kanoko


Masshiro Kinenbi (まっしろ記念日, Pure White Anniversary) by AYASE Riu


Kataomoi no Owaru Cafe (片想いの終わるカフェ, The Coffee Shop that Ends Unrequited Love) by ADACHI Keiko


Great Waiters? (Greatウエイターズ?) by WASHIO Mie

name: Rising Sun R
nutshell: The second series in the Rising Sun story.

name: Brave 10 - 0.5 (Doujinshi)
nutshell: An official Brave 10 doujinshi by SHIMOTSUKI Kairi. A collection of various stories.

name: Touhou Shinigami: Meteor Methuselah Gaiden
nutshell:
From Inconnu:
Zol, a bounty hunter who goes by the name of "Grim Reaper", spends his days chasing criminals under the orders of Fuse, his master and the city's respected major.
One day, Zol takes up responsibility for burying a man who died in a hit-and-run on the streets. But much to his surprise, the supposedly dead man pops out of the coffin!! Is this the world's most wanted man, Methuselah?!
This is the adventure-packed miniseries of the fateful encounter between the Methuselah named Rain and Zol the Grim Reaper, who is the grandfather of Immortal Rain's heroine Machika!!

name: Amagami wo Kimi ni
nutshell: “I… want to be friends with you, Matsumoto!”    In the present day where humans and werebeast are living in harmony, there is something that has been bothering Matsumoto, a Kishu weredog, who actually likes cats. It's about a male calico cat that kept appearing when he was feeding the cats near the school as part of his daily routine. And… there's also the fact that he finds Sasaki, a student from the same seminar, to be cute.    One day, he found out that Sasaki is a werecat as well as that calico cat. And from then on, he can cuddle and pet Sasaki’s cat form all he wants! But the more time they spend together, the more Matsumoto’s feelings for Sasaki go in a direction other than friendship…    This is a fluffy sweet werebeast love story between a quiet Kishu weredog who likes to take care of others and an honestly sweet werecat who start out as friends.

name: Damned
nutshell:
At the turn of the previous century, the earth quaked. The earth's crust began to shift for the fourth time, centering around the coast of the Atlantic Ocean. The entire world's land mass was reduced to 3/5 of the planet, and the human population was reduced by a third. Put simply…the earth had gotten old. In 2039, there was only one country that continued to prosper, glaring around at the rest of the dying planet: Japan.
Todoroki Jin returns to Tokyo, the city where he was born, in hopes of finding his friend Ryoma. Little does Jin know about how Tokyo's changed since his last visit…
The oneshot at the end of volume 3 is called Warrior of the Holy Flame, Abi.
Recommended for fans of Riki-Oh

name: Ginyuushijin no Koi
nutshell: While walking through the park one day middle-schooler Yuuma runs into scary Noboru. The scruffy Noboru claims to be a minstrel, and calls Yuuma his angel of inspiration! Is he just a crazy stalker?
